summary: Newark Liberty Airport (EWR) is a big airport near New York City, serving many international destinations. It's located in New Jersey, between Newark and Elizabeth cities. The airport is a major hub for United Airlines, which is the largest airline there. It started in 1928 and was used by the military during World War II. Over time, it has grown with new buildings and connections to trains. In 2023, it served over 49 million passengers, making it one of the busiest airports in the U.S. and the world.
title: Newark Liberty International Airport
